description:
Handa`s daily antics inspire even more students to embrace him as a treasured friend -- unfortunately, without him realizing it.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Handa et l`absentéiste / Handa en cours de cuisine / Handa et son ami
Handa-kun and the Truant / Handa-kun and Cooking Class / Handa-kun and His Friend
Handa-kun to Futoukou / Handa-kun to Chouri Jisshuu / Handa-kun to Shin`yuu
半田くんと不登校 / 半田くんと調理実習 / 半田くんと親友
